response.overview: In 1937, eight hundred Chinese soldiers fight under siege from a warehouse in the middle of the Shanghai battlefield, completely surrounded by the Japanese army.
response.tagline: Based on the true story of one of the greatest battles of WWII.
response.title: The Eight Hundred
